description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to undergraduate students within the College of Education & Professional Studies who are majoring in Math Education, Science Education or Special Education. Eligibility Requirements Must be a UCO student studying to be a Math, Science or Special Education teacher. Must be admitted to the teacher education program at UCO. Must maintain an overall GPA of 3.0 or higher Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and/or spring semester to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: SIS_College is Education and Prof Studies   or SIS_College is Mathematics and Science   or SIS_College is College of Math and Science   or SIS_College is Mathematics and Science
criteria.raw_text: SIS_College is Education and Prof Studies   or SIS_College is Mathematics and Science   or SIS_College is College of Math and Science   or SIS_College is Mathematics and Science
